title: Paleo Raspberry Jam Recipe
directions: In a sauce pan over medium-high heat, stir in berries and lemon juice
Note: If a little foam surfaces while cooking, just skim it off with a spoon
Next add the honey, stir and reduce heat to medium-low
Mixture will thicken into a jam-like consistency as it cools
Can be stored in fridge for about a week, or frozen in a sealed glass container (such as a mason jar) for a few months
ingredients: 1 lb of fresh or frozen raspberries
